modules.description: Provides predicate, equality, and result testing functions that validate values against expected outcomes, incorporating position tracking and custom comparison logic. Works with arbitrary data types through S-expression serialization and comparator functions. Used to assert conditions, compare values, and report discrepancies in test scenarios with detailed contextual information.

Compares values at runtime and generates error messages with contextual information when they differ. It operates on OCaml values and types, including integers, strings, and custom types. Used to assert equality in tests, providing detailed diagnostics for failed comparisons.

Offers predicate checks, equality comparisons, and result validation with position tracking and custom logic, supporting arbitrary types via S-expressions and comparators. Includes functions to assert conditions, compare values, and report mismatches with detailed context. Operations include `assert`, `equal`, and `check`, enabling precise test validation. Examples include verifying function outputs, comparing complex data structures, and debugging test failures with location-aware error messages.
